message.body: I saw on fb that you got heat exhaustion. How r u feeling?
Mostly better now. It was horrible :(
Very. Take care of yourself, Jeannie! It comes on quicky!
Is it basically not being hydrated???? By the way, do u have an idea if u can make the driftwood Monday, tues and wed starting June 10th?
Yes but mine was because of salt deficiency. I didn't have enough salt, so the water ran through me and sweat out of me. Also, I was way too hot for too long at work!
